body: Damn it damn it damn it, if this doesn't get a translation I'll spontaneously combust

@LCarnitine 
"She's a keeper" you're such a fucking cuck lmao

She says that she thinks the bull's sexual appetite is probably too much for her, and reflects on the fact that his overactive sex drive is what ruined his own marriage, drawing a parallel between that curse of excess and her own husband's "curse" of his cuckoldry fetish.

This is honestly a pretty contemplative work: it really drives home an idea that both sides of the coin are potentially toxic if left unchecked, and the struggle we face therein as hopelessly sexual creatures.

She's a keeper.
Really curious what she says at the end. I like this much more than the cop one.

oh? It's netorase? Kinda unexpected from Iris Art. Seems like the cuck either apologizing for making her sleep with other man or beg her to stop. Well, either way, he still enjoyed seeing her wife getting fucked though. I can't read JP but it seems the wife is kinda chill. Usually it ended with both couple got mindfucked and broken. Huh...
